Name: Urban Oasis
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Alcoholic orange and raspberry sherbet - how bad is that? A crowd pleasing drink.
History: A riff on a French Martini discovered in 2003 at Paramount Hotel, New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Urban Oasis contains 182 calories
